org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign
Class AeCopyStrategyFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign.AeCopyStrategyFactory
public class AeCopyStrategyFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory used to create IAeCopyStrategy instances. These instances are used to implement the logic of the given copy operation.
